attributes.action: Return the Kohinoor diamond to India
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ko-Hi-Noor diamond, once the largest diamond in the world, originates from Golconda region of South India. It was owned by various Indian rulers before being seized by the British in 1877, and is now a part of the Crown Jewels.
 

The Kohinoor diamond must be returned as atonement for colonial past and we must strive to bring it back to its place of inception- India, where it truly belongs. 

Returning the diamond will also lead to further strengthening of relation between India and UK.
 

Together we can make a difference and that moment is NOW.
